00024 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00025 // Function: LibrarySettingsPage()
00026 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00027 LibrarySettingsPage::LibrarySettingsPage(QSettings& settings) : settings_(settings),
00028                                                                 libLocationsList_(0),
00029                                                                 addLocationButton_(0),
00030                                                                 removeLocationButton_(0),
00031                                                                 autoRefreshCheckBox_(0),
00032                                                                 askBeforeRefreshCheckBox_(0)
00033 {
00034     // Create the library location group box.
00035     QGroupBox* locationGroup = new QGroupBox(tr("Library locations"), this);
00036 
00037     libLocationsList_ = new QListWidget(locationGroup);
00038     libLocationsList_->setFixedHeight(120);
00039 
00040     addLocationButton_ = new QPushButton(QIcon(":/icons/graphics/add.png"), QString(), this);
00041     removeLocationButton_ = new QPushButton(QIcon(":/icons/graphics/remove.png"), QString(), this);
00042     removeLocationButton_->setEnabled(false);
00043 
00044     QDialogButtonBox* buttonBox = new QDialogButtonBox(Qt::Vertical);
00045     buttonBox->addButton(addLocationButton_, QDialogButtonBox::ActionRole);
00046     buttonBox->addButton(removeLocationButton_, QDialogButtonBox::ActionRole);
00047 
00048     QHBoxLayout* locationLayout = new QHBoxLayout(locationGroup);
00049     locationLayout->addWidget(libLocationsList_);
00050     locationLayout->addWidget(buttonBox);
00051 
00052     // Create the check boxes.
00053     autoRefreshCheckBox_ = new QCheckBox(tr("Auto-refresh the library on start-up"), this);
00054 
00055     askBeforeRefreshCheckBox_ = new QCheckBox(tr("Ask before refresh"), this);
00056     askBeforeRefreshCheckBox_->setEnabled(false);
00057 
00058     QHBoxLayout* childLayout = new QHBoxLayout();
00059     childLayout->addSpacing(20);
00060     childLayout->addWidget(askBeforeRefreshCheckBox_);
00061 
00062     // Setup the layout.
00063     QVBoxLayout* layout = new QVBoxLayout(this);
00064     layout->addWidget(locationGroup);
00065     layout->addSpacing(12);
00066     layout->addWidget(autoRefreshCheckBox_);
00067     layout->addLayout(childLayout);
00068     layout->addStretch(1);
00069 
00070     // Connect the signals.
00071     connect(addLocationButton_, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(addLocation()));
00072     connect(removeLocationButton_, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(removeLocation()));
00073     connect(libLocationsList_, SIGNAL(currentItemChanged(QListWidgetItem*, QListWidgetItem*)),
00074             this, SLOT(onSelectLocation(QListWidgetItem*, QListWidgetItem*)));
00075     connect(autoRefreshCheckBox_, SIGNAL(toggled(bool)), this, SLOT(onToggleAutoRefresh(bool)));
00076 
00077     loadSettings();
00078 }

00085 }

00087 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00088 // Function: validate()
00089 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00090 bool LibrarySettingsPage::validate()
00091 {
00092     Q_ASSERT(prevalidate());
00093 
00094     return true;
00095 }
00096 
00097 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00098 // Function: apply()
00099 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00100 void LibrarySettingsPage::apply()
00101 {
00102     // Create a string list containing all the location and save it to the settings.
00103     QStringList locations;
00104 
00105     for (int i = 0; i < libLocationsList_->count(); ++i)
00106     {
00107         locations.append(libLocationsList_->item(i)->text());
00108     }
00109 
00110     settings_.setValue("library/locations", locations);
00111 
00112     // Save the check box states.
00113     settings_.setValue("library/autoRefresh", autoRefreshCheckBox_->isChecked());
00114     settings_.setValue("library/askBeforeRefresh", askBeforeRefreshCheckBox_->isChecked());
00115 }
00116 
00117 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00118 // Function: onPageChange()
00119 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00120 bool LibrarySettingsPage::onPageChange()
00121 {
00122     // Do not change the page if the settings are invalid.
00123     if (!validate())
00124     {
00125         return false;
00126     }
00127 
00128     // If they are valid, save them and allow the page to be changed.
00129     apply();
00130     return true;
00131 }
00132 
00133 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00134 // Function: addLocation()
00135 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00136 void LibrarySettingsPage::addLocation()
00137 {
00138     QString dir = QFileDialog::getExistingDirectory(this, tr("Select library location:"));
00139 
00140     if (!dir.isEmpty())
00141     {
00142         QListWidgetItem* item = new QListWidgetItem(dir);
00143         libLocationsList_->addItem(item);
00144         libLocationsList_->setCurrentItem(item);
00145     }
00146 }
00147 
00148 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00149 // Function: removeLocation()
00150 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00151 void LibrarySettingsPage::removeLocation()
00152 {
00153     if (libLocationsList_->currentRow() >= 0)
00154     {
00155         QListWidgetItem* item = libLocationsList_->takeItem(libLocationsList_->currentRow());
00156         delete item;
00157     }
00158 }
00159 
00160 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00161 // Function: onToggleAutoRefresh()
00162 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00163 void LibrarySettingsPage::onToggleAutoRefresh(bool checked)
00164 {
00165     askBeforeRefreshCheckBox_->setEnabled(checked);
00166 }
00167 
00168 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00169 // Function: loadSettings()
00170 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00171 void LibrarySettingsPage::loadSettings()
00172 {
00173     // Load the library locations.
00174     QStringList locations = settings_.value("library/locations", QStringList()).toStringList();
00175 
00176     foreach (QString location, locations)
00177     {
00178         QListWidgetItem* item = new QListWidgetItem(location);
00179         libLocationsList_->addItem(item);
00180     }
00181 
00182     // Load the check box states.
00183     autoRefreshCheckBox_->setChecked(settings_.value("library/autoRefresh", true).toBool());
00184     askBeforeRefreshCheckBox_->setChecked(settings_.value("library/askBeforeRefresh", false).toBool());
00185 }
00186 
00187 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00188 // Function: onSelectLocation()
00189 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00190 void LibrarySettingsPage::onSelectLocation(QListWidgetItem* cur, QListWidgetItem*)
00191 {
00192     removeLocationButton_->setEnabled(cur != 0);
00193 }
